attributes.name: stopped
attributes.description: Allow for stopping the sound effect.

attributes.name: playing
attributes.description: Allow for playing the sound effect.

attributes.name: paused
attributes.description: Allow for pausing the sound effect.

attributes.name: state
attributes.description:
State is for setting:
Possible values: play, pause, stop

attributes.name: image
attributes.description: This allows you to swap out the image

attributes.name: sound
attributes.description: This allows you to swap out the sound.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description:
This is the size of the element. Possible values are:
tiny, small, medium, large, epic

attributes.name: color
attributes.description:
This is to change the color of the element. Possible values are:
red, blue, orange, yellow

attributes.name: reset-sound
attributes.description: Allow for resetting the sound effect.
